Hey! This is centiskor.ch, my hybrid Pok√©mon fan site and homage to Centiskorch.

I've been heavily inspired by a variety of sites, which you can read more about on my About page, as well as Centiskorch, the Radiator Pok√©mon. It's said to be inspired by the Chinese red-headed centipede and radiators, hence the names!

Pok√©mon has been my passion since 1998 and, despite a brief lull in the mid-to-late 00s, it's stronger than ever and this site is a manifestation of that obsession.

Anyway, have a great time and enjoy your time here!
